# Activity 2
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
data(txhousing)
library(dplyr)
glimpse(txhousing)
```
The data set contains 8,602 observations and 9 variables. The variables are
city (character), year (int), month (int), sales (double), volume (double),
median (double), listings (double), inventory (double), and date (double).
